
# SEQL-JS Documentation for LLMs

> @whenessel/seql-js: Semantic Element Query Language (SEQL) for stable DOM element identification.

## Documentation Sets

- [Complete documentation](./llms-full.txt): Full documentation compiled from `docs/` and the repository README
- [LLM-friendly summary](./llms-friendly.txt): Condensed reference focused on APIs, data structures, and defaults

## Notes

- Content is sourced from this repository's documentation and codebase
- Some docs may lag behind code; prefer `src/` for canonical defaults and behaviors
